articles.author: Kevin Liptak, Alex Marquardt, Becky Anderson
articles.title: Efforts to secure hostage deal and pause in Gaza fighting step up as Biden dispatches CIA chief for crucial talks in Europe - CNN
articles.description: Efforts to secure the release of hostages held in Gaza and broker a prolonged pause in fighting are arriving at an important juncture as President Joe Biden deploys a top official to Europe for multiparty talks on the contours of a possible agreement.
articles.content: Efforts to secure the release of hostages held in Gaza and broker a prolonged pause in fighting are at an important juncture as President Joe Biden deploys his point person on hostage talks to Europe… [+7486 chars]

articles.content:
After debuting in China in July 2023, Honor is finally bringing its super-thin Magic V2 foldable to Europe and the UK starting today.

articles.title: Measles in the U.K.: Health authorities warn outbreak could grow - NBC News
articles.description: A serious outbreak of measles in England could continue to grow, health experts have warned, as Europe grapples with a big spike in the contagious disease.
articles.content:
LONDON A serious outbreak of measles in England could grow to tens of thousands of cases, health experts there have warned, as Europe grapples with a spike in the highly contagious disease.
